name: SmartEurekaRobot
0:
”Alexa, turn on vacuum”
”Alexa, turn off vacuum”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
1. Make sure you have the eureka robot App and your robot is connected.
2. Go to Skills & Games and Search for the skill “Smart Eureka Robot”
3. Tap “Enable to use”
4. Follow the steps to link the account. Or, you can tap Settings - Link Account

When connected, you can simply start or stop your robot by voice commands:
Alexa, turn on vacuum
Alexa, turn off vacuum
